doc.field: Census 2000 Population Tables (by Block, Block Group and Tract)
Census 2000 Population Tables (by Block, Block Group and Tract)

This dataset includes three separate tables for census blocks, block groups and tracts. The tables are a select subset of population data from the Census Bureau's P-94-171 redistricting data. These tables can be linked to census block, block group and tract boundary files.
This is a MetroGIS Regionally Endorsed dataset. (See http://www.metrogis.org/data/about/index.shtml#whatis for more information.)
Notes: - When linking population tables to the corresponding shape file, be aware that there are 3 block groups in the block group shape file that have 2 polygons each and 1 tract in the tract shape file that has 2 polygons. This impacts population summaries.
Bg00: 270030509012, 270530253011, 271230426023 Tract00: 27003050901

More information about the PL-94-171 data can be found at http://www.census.gov/ . The data reside in a SAS database and were exported out to Excel spreadsheets and then from Excel to dBase tables.</procdesc> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref>2000 census blocks, block groups and tracts</indspref> <direct /> <mgmg3obj /> <mgmg3til>One file for entire seven county region.</mgmg3til> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <geograph> <latres /> <longres /> </geograph> <planar> <mapproj> <mapprojn /> <mgmg4par /> <otherprj /> </mapproj> <gridsys> <gridsysn /> <utm> <utmzone /> </utm> <spcs> <spcszone /> </spcs> <mgmg4coz /> <mgmg4adj /> </gridsys> <planci> <coordrep> <absres /> <ordres /> </coordrep> <distbrep> <distres /> </distbrep> <plandu /> </planci> </planar> <geodetic> <horizdn /> <ellips /> </geodetic> </horizsys> <vertdef> <altsys> <altdatum /> <altunits /> </altsys> <depthsys> <depthdn /> <depthdu /> </depthsys> </vertdef> </spref> <eainfo> <overview> <eaover>Block file only:
BLK00: 15 digit Census Block code (includes State & County FIPS codes and links to the Blk00 attribute in the block shape file)
Block Group file only:
BG00: Long block group identifier code that includes state and county codes
BLOCKGROUP: 7 digit Census block number (can be used to link to the block group shape file)
Tract file only:
TRACT00: Long tract identifier code that includes state and county codes
TRACT: 6 digit Census tract number (can be used to link to the tract shape file)
The following fields are found in each of the three files:
Total: Total Population
1R: Total One Race
WO: Total White Only
TOMR: Total 2 or More Races
H: Total Hispanic or Latino
NH: Total Not Hispanic or Latino
1R_NH: One Race Not Hispanic or Latino
WO_NH: White Only Not Hispanic or Latino
TOMRNH: 2 or More Races Not Hispanic or Latino
Total_18+: Total Population
1R_18+: Total One Race
WO_18+: Total White Only
TOMR_18+: Total 2 or More Races
H_18+: Total Hispanic or Latino
NH_18+: Total Not Hispanic or Latino
1R_NH_18+: One Race Not Hispanic or Latino
WO_NH_18+: White Only Not Hispanic or Latino
TOMRNH_18+: 2 or More Races Not Hispanic or Latino</eaover> <eadetcit>The Census Bureau web site at http://www.census.gov/ has more information about the PL-94-171 data.
The federal government considers race and Hispanic origin to be two separate and distinct concepts. The question on race for the Census 2000 was different from the one for the 1990 census. Because of these changes, the Census 2000 data on race are not directly comparable with data from the 1990 census or earlier censuses. Please read the Overview of Race and Hispanic Origin from the Census Bureau at www.census.gov/prod/2001pubs/c2kbr01-1.pdf.
For example, Total Population = Total 1 race + Total 2+ races Total Population = Total Hispanic or Latino + Total Not Hispanic or Latino
Other Notes: White Only is a subset of One Race White Only Not Hispanic or Latino is a subset of 1 Race Not Hispanic or Latino. 1 Race Not Hispanic or Latino + Two or more Races Not Hispanic or Latino = Total Not Hispanic or Latino</eadetcit> </overview> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Mark Kotz</cntper> <cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Database Administrator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> mailing and physical address </addrtype> <address>390 Robert Street North</address> <city>St. Paul</city> <state>Minnesota</state> <postal>55101-1805</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651-602-1644</cntvoice> <cntfax>651-602-1674</cntfax> <cntemail>mark.kotz@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>Census2000Population</resdesc> <distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13).
